name: DeathDive
description:
Welcome to DeathDive!

A game about escaping from a simulation which you may or may not survive.

In DeathDive, you follow the story of Arata Kujo. A high school student who gets bullied by a few of the seniors at his school. One day, Arata wakes up in a simulation game known as DeathDive.

Why is he there? How does he escape? Why are the bullies from his school there too? 
It's up to you to figure it out.

Survive in multiple areas with set time limits, run from your fate, and unlock the secrets behind the DeathDive simulation. 
With multiple endings, a diverse soundtrack, cinematic cutscenes, all for the cost of nothing, you would have to be an idiot yourself not try it out.

Enjoy your swim!

While you still can anyway...

for any questions, feel free to ask in my discord server: https://discord.gg/CmpT8G8Cv9
